about_the_game:
Puppet Seed is a Sandbox CRPG created by a Solo Developer using Unreal Engine 5.
The minimum requirement for GPU Vram is 6gb. The game will launch on Steam for $7.65.

Puppet Seed combines two game features which are rarely seen together. Permanent, customizable AI Companions and a seamless, non level-gated, 3D Open World. Collect, train and upgrade unique party members with modular armor, weapons and skills as well as summoning powerful combat monsters. Explore the frozen surface of Echora on foot as well as using your player owned vehicle, defeating opponents in a non-linear, sandbox world. Be mindful that your reputation matters, the conflicts you chose will determine which groups will hunt you and which ones will open new trade opportunities!

short_description: Collect humanoid and monster companions from 8 races, each with their own regions, settlements and elemental affinities. Spend stat and skill points to gain new abilities for your team and player character. Mix different squad compositions in real-time combat while exploring on foot or by vehicle.
